questions.action_on_change: theweight=  parseInt(ResultOfQuestion('Weightinkg')); theheight = parseInt(ResultOfQuestion('Heightincm')); thebmi = theweight/Math.pow(theheight/100,2); dialogcontent =thebmi; alert 'the bmi is ' + thebmi; options = {};  $('[data-remodal-id=modal]').remodal(options).open();

questions.label: Please briefly summarize the visit in one or two sentences.
